successes.title: eleMount : Premium Mount / Stand for iPhone, iPad, Android
successes.description: CNC machined aluminum mount for smartphones and tablets. The easiest way to mount mobile devices.

Pledges.description: This may seem like a small donation, but not to us. Every pledge helps us meet our goal. You will have access to product updates as well as having your name included on our website thank you page. Thanks for the support!
On-the-Go elePads 2 Pack of 3.5" Pads (Perfect for on-the-go and small enough to keep in your pocket or a purse/bag)
